title: 2022 Toyota Sienna: The Minivan Evolves
sub_head: The fourth-generation Sienna trades its former V6 engine for a hybrid powertrain. And its roomy interior, among other features and upgrades, may give SUV buyers a reason to reconsider the minivan category.
body:
THE ALARM went off. I shed the duvet and hit the deck. Dad duty.
It was 10:45 p.m. and my daughters needed to be picked up after a friendâ€™s party. The roads were icy. I trotted out to the 2022 Toyota Sienna Hybrid Platinum ($53,130, as tested), started the engine and set the seat-heater controls to lobster tail. Five minutes later, I returned to find the cabin warm, the instruments bright and the hybrid powertrain silent, on ready-standby.
